Uses of Class
Game.Items.Cards.Card

  • Packages that use Card 
    Package Description
    Game.Core
    The core functionality of the game.
    Game.Items
    Different classes that represent items used by the game.
    Game.Items.Cards
    Contains all the cards that is implemented.
    Game.Player
    Contains classes that play the game and represent the game to the player.
    Server
    Contains the server functionality, what connects the game with the network.
